LAPPS Certificate Authority

Problem

  1. Each server needs a security certificate.
  2. If a server's security certificate is not signed by a trusted authority the user's browser is likely to complain.
    • Self-signed certificates (which is all the ANC has) # Solution

Create our own Certificate A *Certificate Authority (CA) is an organization trusted to "sign"
